sources.title: Tightrope Tricks (1933)
sources.description: Tightrope Tricks is a Tom and Jerry cartoon directed by John Foster, George Rufle. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/tightrope-tricks-1933/

metadata.Plot: Tom and Jerry have fun at the circus and then show their acrobatic talents on a tightrope. They get into trouble with an ornery lion and are chased from the Big Top by the feline's friends. When the defend themselves by spraying the lions away with an elephant's trunk, they accidentally flood the circus but are able to float away unscathed.
